UI_CompleteCrewTooltipBody: Show only vehicles with complete crew.
UI_NoMasterTooltipBody: Show only vehicles without 'Ace Tanker' mastery badge.
UI_NonEliteTooltipBody: Show only vehicles with not all modules and technical branches researched.
UI_TrainingCrewTooltipBody: Show only vehicles that have crews with less than 100% training level.
UI_setting_enableLockBackground_tooltip: Set to false to remove background for locked vehicles (default: true).
UI_setting_hideBottomText_tooltip: Hide text at bottom of tooltip showing quantity of used equipment, optional devices and crew.
UI_setting_rows_tooltip: Number of rows of multi-row tank carousel.
UI_setting_showTotalSlots_tooltip: show total slots count in the (Buy vehicle) cell.
UI_setting_showUsedSlots_tooltip: Show used slots count in the (Buy slot) cell.
UI_setting_smallDoubleCarousel_tooltip: Use small icons in the tank carousel.
